revised_title: Morphological and Functional Development of the Eel Leptocephalus Ariosoma balearicum
tldr: This study examines the morphological and functional development of the eel leptocephalus Ariosoma balearicum, focusing on its structures responsible for osmoregulation. The research reveals many features of structural and functional immaturity in the leptocephalus, which is an obligatory inhabitant of the open ocean until it undergoes metamorphosis.
